entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
